author: djames
msg: Updated wc.WC.export to no longer pass NULL for the peg_revision argument.
Without this fix, the bindings would not work for Subversion 1.6.x+.
* csvn/wc.py (WC.export): Created an svn_opt_revision_t argument to be
passed for the peg_revision argument instead of NULL.

author: danielsh
msg: Vote for r32497 and nominate r32639 with hwright's vote from IRC.
Move approved revisions to the "Approved changes" section.

author: danielsh
msg: (create_in_repo_subdir):  Fail if SVNRepositoryCreateFailure was not raised.

author: danielsh
msg: (svn_client_export4):  Clarify that NULL arguments are not allowed.

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r32636, including danielsh's vote from IRC.
